p: Furthermore, the trends observed in the SC are at least one order of magnitude greater than those reported for the global ocean intermediate layer (ref. 24 dT/dt = 0.003 °C yr −1, 0–700 m, global, 1955–2010; ref. 25 dT/dt = 0.0006–0.0013 °C yr −1, 100–300 m, global, 2004–2013; ref. 26 dT/dt = 0.005 °C yr −1, 0–500 m, global, 2006–2013; ref. 27 dS/dt = 0.0002–0.0006 yr −1, 200–700 m, Atlantic Ocean).
